title: Finally Got The "Third Icon"
body: Won 7 straight Teemo games in a row and just won my last with bard, finally got awarded the icon with Tf N Graves on it, good night.

replies.body: When I saw I have to win at least 6 game, my eyes were wide open with the mouth said: "Ritoooooooooooo!!!"

That's at least 12 games if you have a 50% win rate.
3 games a day. Get the icon in 4 days.
4 games a day. Get the icon in 3 days.
6 games a day. Get the icon in 2 days.

Try Gangplank's icon.
750 krakens to spend.
15 full brawler upgrades to get.
Being jungler helps, but DAMN that's a ton of games.

And in black market, the game tense to last longer, about 30~50 mins a game so 2 games a day my friend :D
P/s: I still have uni to do so not so much time to play.
The GP Icon is even harder to get, u have to liek get 750 silver serpents and 7 level 3 mercenary upgrades to unlock.

15, not 7.
I'm at 13...

Amd it's 750 krakens. Can't get serpents with GP dead.

Good on you man, i still need to get 2 full brawler upgrades for the GP icon. Probably going for it tonight.

The good part is, as long as teleport boots are bugged, i doubt they'll end the event ;)
